attributes.additional_details: To preserve, protect and promote our national flag.
attributes.background:
The Union Jack flag represents the UK.

It must be made a criminal offence to remove, deface or damage it in any way.

And furthermore, it must a right of every UK citizen to show, fly or display the Union Jack on their own property or in public without permission being required.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325545

You do not need consent to fly the Union Jack presently. A guide on the rules for flying flags is available here: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/15438/flying_flags_guide.pdf
